.b-tree-icon.b-icon.b-icon-circle.title: Expand/collapse
.b-tree-icon.b-icon.b-icon-circle.content: By clicking on the small arrow icons in the tree or by using the keyboard ([SPACE] or [SHIFT] + arrow keys)

.b-grid-cell[data-column=\"capacity\"].title: Aggregation Column
.b-grid-cell[data-column=\"capacity\"].content: Branch nodes draw the value from an aggregation of the values of their children
